info.title: DuckyAPI
info.description: A customer facing api for WildDuck

username.description: Username of the user you want to login as

password.description: Password of the user you want to login as

rememberMe.description: Makes the token have a longer expiry time

accessToken.description: Access token that can be used to authenticate against the api

expires.description: The expiry date of the access token

suspended.description: A suspended user doesn't have access to most api methods, and all accounts and forwarders are suspended

quota.description: Storage quota in bytes, 0 is unlimited

maxSend.description: Max send quota for accounts created by this user, 0 is unlimited

maxReceive.description: Max recieve quota for accounts created by this user, 0 is unlimited

maxForward.description: Max forward quota for accounts created by this user, 0 is unlimited

packageId.description: Package id to assign to this user

onlyDeleteDomainsAndSuspend.description: If true will not delete the user, but delete all domains and suspend the user

packageId.description: Package id to assign to this user

suspended.description: A suspended user doesn't have access to most api methods, and all accounts and forwarders are suspended

name.description: Display name to use for this package

quota.description: Storage quota in bytes, 0 is unlimited

maxSend.description: Max send quota for accounts created by this user, 0 is unlimited

maxReceive.description: Max recieve quota for accounts created by this user, 0 is unlimited

maxForward.description: Max forward quota for accounts created by this user, 0 is unlimited

dkim.description: If DKIM is active for this domain
If DKIM is active for this domain

admin.description: If this user is the domain admin, this currently serves no function

type.description: Type of error/warning. Can be ns, mx, spf, dkim

message.example: DKIM is enabled, but no record was found

allOf.description: Current values of the DNS records
Correct values of the DNS records

errors.description: List of errors with the DNS records

warnings.description: List of warnings with the DNS records

id.description: The unique id of the email account

name.description: The name of the email account

address.description: The E-Mail address of the email account

allowed.description: How many bytes the account is allowed to use

used.description: How many bytes the account is currently using

id.description: The unique id of the email account

name.description: The name of the email account

address.description: The E-Mail address of the email account

disabled.description: If true then the account can not authenticate or receive any new mail

aliases.description: List of aliases for this account

allowed.description: How many bytes the account is allowed to use

used.description: How many bytes the account is currently using

allowed.description: How many messages can be sent per period

used.description: How many messages were sent in the current period

ttl.description: Seconds until the end of the current period

allowed.description: How many messages can be received per period

used.description: How many messages were received in the current period

ttl.description: Seconds until the end of the current period

allowed.description: How many messages can be forwarded per period

used.description: How many messages were forwarded in the current period

ttl.description: Seconds until the end of the current period

allOf.description: How many emails the account can send in a period
How many emails the account can receive in a period
How many emails the account can forward in a period

id.description: The unique id of the email account

name.description: The name of the email account

address.description: The E-Mail address of the email account

disabled.description: If true then the account can not authenticate or receive any new mail

aliases.description: List of aliases for this account

spamLevel.description: Relative scale for detecting spam. 0 means that everything is spam, 100 means that nothing is spam

disabledScopes.description: List of scopes that are disabled for this user

quota.description: How many bytes the account is allowed to use

send.description: How many emails the account can send in a period

receive.description: How many emails the account can receive in a period

forward.description: How many emails the account can forward in a period

name.description: The name of the email account

spamLevel.description: Relative scale for detecting spam. 0 means that everything is spam, 100 means that nothing is spam

disabledScopes.description: List of scopes that are disabled for this user

address.description: The E-Mail address of the email account

password.description: The new password of the email account

name.description: The name of the email account

spamLevel.description: Relative scale for detecting spam. 0 means that everything is spam, 100 means that nothing is spam

disabledScopes.description: List of scopes that are disabled for this user

password.description: The new password of the email account

disabled.description: If true then the account can not authenticate or receive any new mail

name.description: Domain name to which the TXT record should be added

id.description: Unique id of the DKIM key

domain.description: The domain this DKIM key applies to

fingerprint.description: Unique id of the DKIM key

publicKey.description: Public key in DNS format (no prefix/suffix, single line)

allOf.description: Value for the DNS TXT record

created.description: Datestring of the time the DKIM key was created

privateKey.description: Pem formatted DKIM private key. If not set then a new 2048 bit RSA key is generated, beware though that it can take several seconds to complete

id.description: The unique id of the forwarder

address.description: The E-Mail address of the forwarder

allowed.description: How many messages can be forwarded per period

used.description: How many messages were forwarded in the current period

ttl.description: Seconds until the end of the current period

id.description: The unique id of the forwarder

address.description: The E-Mail address of the forwarder

forward.description: How many messages can be forwarded per period

targets.description: An array of forwarding targets. The value could either be an email address or a relay url to next MX server ("smtp://mx2.zone.eu:25") or an URL where mail contents are POSTed to

address.description: The E-Mail address that should be forwarded

targets.description: An array of forwarding targets. The value could either be an email address or a relay url to next MX server ("smtp://mx2.zone.eu:25") or an URL where mail contents are POSTed to

address.description: The E-Mail address that should be forwarded

_id.description: Unique id for this api key

issuedAt.description: Date the api key was issued

accessToken.description: API key that can be used to authenticate against the api

disabled.description: If true, then this filter is ignored

created.description: Datestring of the time the filter was created

from.description: Partial match for the From: header (case insensitive)

to.description: Partial match for the To:/Cc: headers (case insensitive)

subject.description: Partial match for the Subject: header (case insensitive)

listId.description: Partial match for the List-ID: header (case insensitive)

ha.description: Does a message have to have an attachment or not

size.description: Message size in bytes. If the value is a positive number then message needs to be larger, if negative then message needs to be smaller than abs(size) value

seen.description: If true then mark matching messages as Seen

flag.description: If true then mark matching messages as Flagged

delete.description: If true then do not store matching messages

spam.description: If true then store matching messags to Junk Mail folder

mailbox.description: Mailbox ID to store matching messages to

targets.description: An array of forwarding targets. The value could either be an email address or a relay url to next MX server ("smtp://mx2.zone.eu:25") or an URL where mail contents are POSTed to

disabled.description: If true, then this filter is ignored

allOf.description: Rules that a message must match
Rules that a message must match

disabled.description: If true, then this filter is ignored

allOf.description: Rules that a message must match
Rules that a message must match

delete.description: Note: This resource is forbidden when using an API key as authorization. Use an access token.

x-code-samples.label: Curl
x-code-samples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:3000/users \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"username":"johndoe","password":"supersecret","packageId":"5d49e11f600a423ffc0b1297"}'

get.summary: Get account info for current access token

x-code-samples.label: Curl
x-code-samples.source:
curl --request PUT \
  --url http://localhost:3000/users/me \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"username":"johndoe","password":"supersecret"}'

get.summary: [Admin only] Get a list of packages

x-code-samples.label: Curl
x-code-samples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:3000/packages \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"name":"Small","quota":1073741824,"maxSend":200,"maxReceive":1000,"maxForward":100}'

put.description: Will also update quota for existing users, except if you modified the users quota manually.

delete.description: WARNING: This will also delete any email accounts, forwarders, and DKIM keys associated with this domain

404.description: Domain not found on user

x-code-samples.label: Curl
x-code-samples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:3000/domains \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"domain":"example.com"}'

200.description: The current and the correct DNS records for this domain

404.description: Domain not found on user
Domain not found on user
Domain not found on user
No account found with this id
No account found with this id
No account found with this id

x-code-samples.label: Curl
x-code-samples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:3000/accounts \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"name":"John Doe","spamLevel":50,"limits":{"quota":1073741824,"send":200,"receive":1000,"forward":100},"disabledScopes":["imap","pop3"],"address":"john@example.com","password":"verysecret"}'

404.description: No account found with this id

x-code-samples.label: Curl
x-code-samples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:3000/accounts/%7BaccountId%7D/aliases \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"name":"John Doe","address":"john@example.com"}'

404.description: No account or alias found with this id

delete.summary: Delete DKIM key for a domain

404.description: Domain not found in account

get.summary: Get DKIM key info for a domain

404.description: Domain not found in account

put.summary: Add or update DKIM key for a domain

404.description: Domain not found in account

x-code-samples.label: Curl
x-code-samples.source:
curl --request PUT \
  --url http://localhost:3000/domains/%7BdomainOrAlias%7D/dkim \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"selector":"default","privateKey":"-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----..."}'

404.description: No forwarder found with this id
No forwarder found with this id
No forwarder found with this id

x-code-samples.label: Curl
x-code-samples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:3000/forwarders \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"name":"John Doe","targets":["johndoe@example.com","smtp://mx.example.com:25","https://example.com"],"limits":{"forward":600},"address":"john@example.com"}'

post.description: Note: This resource is forbidden when using an API key as authorization. Use an access token.

x-code-samples.label: Curl
x-code-samples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:3000/apikeys \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"name":"API key for my script"}'

delete.description: Note: This resource is forbidden when using an API key as authorization. Use an access token.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique id of the api key

404.description: No account or filter found with this id
No account or filter found with this id
No account or filter found with this id

x-code-samples.label: Curl
x-code-samples.source:
curl --request PUT \
  --url http://localhost:3000/accounts/%7BaccountId%7D/filters/%7BfilterId%7D \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"name":"Mark as seen from John","disabled":false,"query":{"from":"John","to":"John","subject":"You have 1 new notification","listId":"John'\''s list","text":"Dedicated servers","ha":false,"size":1000},"action":{"seen":true,"flag":true,"delete":true,"spam":true,"mailbox":"5a1c0ee490a34c67e266932c","targets":["johndoe@example.com","smtp://mx.example.com:25","https://example.com"]}}'

404.description: No account found with this id
No account found with this id

x-code-samples.label: Curl
x-code-samples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:3000/accounts/%7BaccountId%7D/filters \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"name":"Mark as seen from John","disabled":false,"query":{"from":"John","to":"John","subject":"You have 1 new notification","listId":"John'\''s list","text":"Dedicated servers","ha":false,"size":1000},"action":{"seen":true,"flag":true,"delete":true,"spam":true,"mailbox":"5a1c0ee490a34c67e266932c","targets":["johndoe@example.com","smtp://mx.example.com:25","https://example.com"]}}'
